snippet.title: Planet Zoo: Console Edition | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Planet Zoo: Console Edition launches March 26th!

Pre-order today to receive 3 exclusive animals: https://bit.ly/YT-PlanetZooConsole

Build a world for wildlife with Planet Zoo: Console Edition. From the developers of Planet Coaster and Zoo Tycoon, the ultimate zoo simulation is arriving on console. Planet Zoo brings controller support that puts powerful creative tools at your fingertips and includes years’ worth of features, content, and animals from the celebrated PC video game’s free updates.

For more news and information about Planet Zoo:
Website: www.planetzoogame.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/PlanetZooGame
Twitter: www.twitter.com/PlanetZooGame
Instagram: @PlanetZooGame
TikTok: PlanetZooGame

Planet Zoo © 2024 Frontier Developments plc. All rights reserved.
